name: Palace of Cards
description: Play cards online with other players from around the world and choose from 6 unique games: Rummy, Solitaire, Mau-Mau (Crazy Eights), Skat, Sheepshead & Doppelkopf. Each game comes with its own community, league systems, clubs, statistics & insights, and much more. Play now, for free!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Graphics: None Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: None Additional Notes: The game should generally run on low systems. If you experience problems, be sure to switch to low quality in the game preferences.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Graphics: Dedicated graphics card Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Sound optional
